mapper.select: select r.reservation_num, r_realTime, r.r_time from RESERVATION_INFO r, reservation_time t where reservation_num =#{ rNum} and r.r_time=t.r_time order by t.r_time

select i.reservation_num,r_time,day ,user_id from RESERVATION_INFO i, reservation r where i.reservation_num =r.reservation_num and room_name=#{roomName} and year=#{year} and month=#{month} order by day, r_time
